text: In the event the law in the state wherein this Last Will and Testament is offered for probate requires that a resident of that state serve with my named Alternate Executor and my named Alternate Executor is not a resident of that state, then and in that event, I leave the choice of the person to serve with my named Alternate Executor in his sole and exclusive discretion.
